title: Spellthief: A League Novel

embed.description: Direct Link**](http://archiveofourown.org/works/1040588?show_comments=true&view_full_work=true) This work is available to download FREE in...

body: Ive been following this post from the NA forums for about a year when they finally released it, that was 2 years ago but it was still my favorite League read ever. I linked above and hope you guys appreciate and love this novel as much as I did.
